author: matteosan1
body:
Add fillDescriptions method to UncalibRechitProducer to allow easier HLT configuration handling.
In order to allow to keep the possibility to switch between "Weights" and Multifit in confDb I have also modified the structure of the PSet so that all the parameters not common to different algorithms are now inside the algoPSet PSet.
title: Topic fill description uncalib rechit
